Summary :
    In this paper That Urdu Text to speech system convert it into to **Selection Unit** and **HMM Model Base Synthesis**
    In Selection unit where suitable pre-recorded units are concatenated to obtain the speech of the given text and HMM Model Base Synthesis
    is a statictical parameteric technique . Given Text convert it into speech using parameteric representation . The main advantage is it stored
    Parameteric representation rather than waveform.
